ctu_text: Terms and conditions as a part of this agreement will be prescribed by the Department of MSME & T, WB in due course of implementation of the scheme. \n"}, {"question": "How does the Directorate of Textile scrutinize and conduct physical inspection of the enterprise upon receiving its application for incentives? ", "answer": "On receipt of application for incentive from an enterprise the Directorate of Textile shall make, as expeditiously as possible and not later than 15 days, scrutiny of/ enquiry into particulars furnished by the enterprise and cause physical inspection of the enterprise through the Officers of the Directorate to ascertain Fixed Capital Investment proposed to be made in Plant and Machinery (new age shuttle less loom) by it. "}, {"question": "What is the procedure for claiming the Subsidy?
